Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic put up MVP numbers finishing the night with 27 points, 16 rebounds, and 9 assists shooting 56/75/100 from the field and propelling the Nuggets to victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Nuggets coach Michael Malone shared an update on Jamal Murray's status, indicating that Murray did some cardio and the team will be cautious with his return, estimating 5-7 days for recovery.
